entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Salaberry-de-Valleyfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:24 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 5.
